title: Oh, How Sylvester Can Pester!: And Other Poems More or Less About Manners
description: Robert Kinerk pokes fun at what can happen when good manners are neglected. From Eleanor Ickity who is served nothing that she likes to eat or Sylvester who can pester and pester and pester, this charming cast of characters will warn the ill mannered about the consequences of their shameful behavior.
author: Robert Kinerk
